argument.name: Style_Sheet_List
argument.description: A CR-LF delimited list of style sheets provided with Alpha Anywhere.

page.description: Lists all the CSS files installed in the CSS folder of the A5 Executable path
page.discussion: The A5_CSS_LIST() function returns a list of CSS style sheets provided with Alpha Anywhere. These style sheets are for use with the Application Server.
page.example: ? A5_CSS_LIST() = Airport AlphaSports Arizona Army Barbie Battleship Beach Bertram BlackWhite blank Blue Blueberry ...
